item.title: Fire Emblem Heroes data with rvest
item.description: Introduction In this post, we will attempt to collect some data about the mobile game Fire Emblem Heroes by Intelligent Systems and Nintendo. To do this, weâ€™ll use the rvest package to scrape data from the Fire Emblem Heroes Gamepedia page Loading packages library("rvest") Scraping data Fire Emblem Heroes is a tactical RPG game in which players compete against the AI by trying to defeat their teams, composed of up to four characters (heroes).
